column3:
â€œJust got a batch. Lot of purple and red blotches and bright orange and milky yellow hairs. Delightdul taste, fruity almost candy like. High reminded me of blue dream,very balanced.
FYI 90% of the pics on this page are altered to show the rainbow colors". its painfully obvious lol. Very rare for a plant to show colors like that on the actual buds
column4: usually the "purple" or other color in the name refers to the plants a...â€"

column3:
â€œOh Epic Rainbow Kush
You delight my senses
Twinkling purple streaks
Amid gold and crystalline embroidery
Your taste - smooth as a river
Flowing from my lips
My lips which relax into a smile
Smiling up at the sun
The sun smiling down on me
Me and my sweet little bowl
of Epic Rainbow Kushâ€

â€œThis is the best strain I have found and it has to be the Rainbow with nothing added to the strain. I'm a high tolerance person where it's really hard to find strains that work, Rainbow was the first strain that I researched to find out that Rainbow was even better than the reviews. My only problem I have is that the availability since it so hard to find. For myself I have tried Rainbow Kush and it didn't work for me...â€

â€œThis is exactly what you're looking for in a sativa if what you're looking for is enough energy to do the things you'd like to be doing and a head buzz that doesn't interfere with your cognitive abilities.â€

â€œFrom what I see in the pictures (the few out there) this is THE BUD!  In 1994 I lived in VA and drove cross country to Santa Barbara with my buddy to visit our bro.  Chillin on the beach on UCSB campus around sunset my friend and I are puffin' and we see two other people.  Of course we trade hits.  We had OK stuff from VA (when we usually got shaky seedy stick...ugh! yuck!), but nothing special.  This guy gives us a ...â€
â€œThis is shit fucking crazy!!!!!!!!!â€

â€œI bought some of this on July 25 at Cannabis City in Seattle. I waited in line for 2 and a half hours and was only able to buy 2g. I wish I could have bought more, because this strain is very potent medicine. I have a high tolerance, but this strain gets me totally stoned. It works well for anxiety as well as insomnia. I will likely not find this strain again, as I am from New Mexico. If you come across this buy as m...â€

â€œThis review is about some RSO made from the Rainbow strain. I picked it up at Canna-Daddy dispensary on the recommendation of the staff member who helped me, when I asked for something for muscle spasms and sleep. He said he had encounter nothing better for the muscle pain and spasms. The RSO is tested at about 35% THC and 13.5% CBD. No wonder it's good for muscles spasms and nerve problems with that kind of CBD cont...â€
â€œdelicious smell and taste.  Leaves the air smelling really nice :-)  A good classic indica feel to itâ€

â€œVery sweet smell to these buds, but not overpowering. Would recommend for someone who wants pain management but still have a good head high. I have a somewhat high tolerance and after two bowls I was pretty lifted, got a tingly body throughout along with more social, but if you smoke too much you'll get a headache from this one. Really good strain!â€

â€œA sweet, super dense bud that leaves you feeling like you're floating in the zero gravity of outer space. This fruity indica dominant strain leaves your mind in the clouds with your body buzzing on the ground. The smoke for me was pretty harsh but I love the high you get from it. Waves of euphoria that tingles in your toes and fingers make this bud a top 5 bud, if you can get it do it!!â€

â€œThis weed has many different colors and when smoked has a very sweet taste like candy. This weed produced strong cerebral effects that gave me a blast at the state basketball tournament! Great weed for getting competitiveâ€

â€œVery clean high, great for days when you don't have many responsibilities, when you have time to chill out. Also great for focusing on hard activities such as body boarding at the beach as well as enjoying warm sunny days as school begins to end :)â€
â€œThis is the best strain out their but it's so hard to find. If you can find Rainbow (not Rainbow Kush) get as much as you can.â€
â€œextremely balanced hybrid that leaves you with a free-floating body and sharpened mind. perfect for a night on the townâ€

â€œGot a vape cartridge for this particular strain. Very nice, definitely helped to relax me as I am ADHD combined meaning ADD with ADHD. I also have high anxiety. This definitely did make my head a little foggy but not in an anxiety state. Definitely would recommend!â€
â€œGreat as a muscle relaxant! Works better than baclofen for spacistity. Sedating, but still cerebral.â€
â€œVivaldi sounds great anytime but with this stuff I feel like I can experience every note.â€
â€œThis is one of my favorite strains.  Sometimes difficult to find, Rainbow and Rainbow Kush are great and I would recommend rainbow to high tolerance tokers who like a relaxing and euphoric high.â€
â€œextremely balanced hybrid that leaves you with a free-floating body and sharpened mind. perfect for a night on the townâ€

â€œHappy long Thanksgiving weekend, Stoners!Â Â 

One of the sixÂ Cacadia herbal tinctures I picked up cheaply at Chalice recently is Rainbow.Â  I'm toward the end of the bottle and figured I'd better review it before it's gone!Â Â 
Rainbow is sweet tasting in this tincture and this hybrid of Dancehall and Blueberry put me soon at peace, cotton fluffy clouds in a blue sky walking on air kind of peace.Â  No real body high or cr...â€
â€œThis is great if u can find it try it. I've had a hard time trying to find something to work. This one works great for people with a high tolerance.â€
â€œ5/5. Nice dense purple buds! Amazing smell and flavor. If you see some around, def pick up! Solid strain for any occasion. Easy to roll as well, nice and sticky.â€

â€œLife saver! I've had a bad ache in my joints lately & don't like taking pills for pain, was looking for a strain that would help and also take my mind off some bullshit - this strain did exactly what I needed it too and added a good amount of giggles. It did keep me up kind of late, but it kept me out of pain! Definitely indulge in this if you get the chance!â€
â€œMind was rainbow dream". Very smooth. Barely coughed. Great stuff. 4 hours of uplifting happiness.â€"

â€œWhat I sampled, didn't have red nor blue nor purple hues; only orange hair and green leaves. The seller informed me that the appearance would depend on the grower and the ambient growing conditions. Anyway I bought a small gram from him to experience the rarity of the strain. Despite not having multi-colored appearance it  did raise the level of happiness and optimism to a higher degree;a very cheery smoke indeed. (P...â€

â€œthe rainbow and black rhino was really good the smells when I first opened were amazing and I loved the highs:) dharma meds 2 service was also excellent they were really fast and super friendly, I would recommend anyone here. the prices were also the best ive seen yet:)â€
â€œIf you like highs that feel more psychedelic than the lsd strain this is a good pick but if you have any kind of anxiety I would steer clear of this one. Got me good and high but at what costâ€

â€œI am finding Rainbow to be a fantastic go to strain for managing daytime pain. The mix of THC to CBD seems to be just right to keep me moving and thinking at the same time. I don't get high so much as I get happy and relaxed in a very pleasant and productive way.â€
â€œThis is great if u can find it try it. I've had a hard time trying to find something to work. This one works great for people with a high tolerance.â€
â€œAt a low temp in the vape I got a pretty heady stone and was pretty anxious for the low temp. Smells great, though.â€

â€œLife saver! I've had a bad ache in my joints lately & don't like taking pills for pain, was looking for a strain that would help and also take my mind off some bullshit - this strain did exactly what I needed it too and added a good amount of giggles. It did keep me up kind of late, but it kept me out of pain! Definitely indulge in this if you get the chance!â€

The seller informed me that the appearance would depend on the grower and the ambient growing conditions. Anyway I bought a small gram from him to experience the rarity of the strain. Despite not having multi-colored appearance it  did raise the level of happiness and optimism to a higher degree;a very cheery smoke indeed. (P...â€

â€œOverall, not my favorite but I'll still smoke it. Great smell but thought it kinda smells like burnt candy once smoked. Helps me enjoy focusing on a task but if I smoke at night, I'm out like a light. Doesn't last forever, maybe an hour and no 'foggy' feeling afterwards.â€

â€œLife saver! I've had a bad ache in my joints lately & don't like taking pills for pain, was looking for a strain that would help and also take my mind off some bullshit - this strain did exactly what I needed it too and added a good amount of giggles. It did keep me up kind of late, but it kept me out of pain! Definitely indulge in this if you get the chance!â€
â€œVery smooth hits, with a strong body buzz. Uplifted head high yet relaxed with the CBD content.â€
â€œAt a low temp in the vape I got a pretty heady stone and was pretty anxious for the low temp. Smells great, though.â€
â€œNice and relaxing. Gave me the laughs. Let me fall asleep earlier than normal.â€

â€œTried unicorn rainbow in San Diego... it definitely made me more giggly and funny than wet dream strain... but it did make me feel more relaxed and laid back as well. I like feeling more energetic, so this strain is good for relaxing and just enjoying life... talking, eating, joking around... also made me feel like a kid, just enjoying the most simple pleasures in life. Went to a park and was just taking pictures of ...â€
â€œlevelâ€
â€œlike a rainbow in the dark. DIO, this strain had citrus flavor, good buzz early, creative mid buzz. slight headache at the finish. check it out. its a good smoke.â€
â€œExtremely potent strain, I bought an unknown to me and was very impressed!â€
â€œBest stain for ADHD!â€
â€œBest strain I've found but hard to findâ€
â€œFreaking love it growing next seasonâ€
â€œThis is my girls favorite strain! Tastes amazing very uplifting and fun. Smells great, looks great, and tastes great! Had some color I haven't quite seen before.â€
â€œGood smoke. A little harsh. Good smell and flavor. Slow onset nice high. Felt a bit tired shortly after could have just been me.â€

â€œI haven't had this strain and I really want to know what seed companies carry feminized rainbow seeds. The company producing them is lifetime seeds but they are out of stock. Every other place has rainbow kush and those are 2 completely different strains. If anyone knows information about rainbow seeds please let me know. Thanks fellow tokers âœŒâ€
â€œlevelâ€

â€œFirst time smoking through Pax Era and this got me hooked! This was the perfect type for a relaxed drive down to bdubs where I ate more than the three other guys I went with! This will keep you focused but will also keep you relaxed.â€

â€œTried unicorn rainbow in San Diego... it definitely made me more giggly and funny than wet dream strain... but it did make me feel more relaxed and laid back as well. I like feeling more energetic, so this strain is good for relaxing and just enjoying life... talking, eating, joking around... also made me feel like a kid, just enjoying the most simple pleasures in life. Went to a park and was just taking pictures of ...â€
â€œpicked up a prerolled joint since I am out of state, nice uplifting high and very tasty.â€

â€œThis review is based off a Cannasol batch packed in 8/15 and imbibed 1/16.

Wow. Seeing is believing with this strain. It's obvious upon glimpsing these nugs that they were hearty, healthy, and potent. But even more communicative of this strain's quality is the smell and taste of both bud and smoke. It is among the top three or two for me, personally. More generally. the grow choice here with this strain is absolutel...â€

â€œit was suggested by a friend so I gave it a shot. I hotboxed my bathroom like usual and smoked a gram and headed upstairs to get my Ipad like usual. before I knew it a euphoric tingle ran through my body and next thing I know I'm on my couch trawling about life and solving my problems. Best stuff I've had so farâ€
â€œI enjoyed this thoroughly.  its the perfect weed to relax and zone out. Thumbs upâ€

â€œ9.1 20+AAA
colourful!!!!!!!!!
MUST TRY!!!â€
â€œVery good quality.â€
â€œi wanna smoke it that looks beond dankâ€

â€œWow. First time trying this, used it for cramps. While it wasn't knocking me out, I wouldn't use this on a day when I need to get shit done. My attention span? Gone. Can't focus. Felt like I needed an adult because it wasn't going to be me. Helped with the pain, though. Dry mouth. 

(Used a pre-roll from Harvest of Tempe. Vaped with a pulsar apx.)â€
â€œNice and relaxing. Gave me the laughs. Let me fall asleep earlier than normal.â€

â€œThe best thing ever. For now... Really perfect. The best fruity flavour and a great happy high. Not for pre-parties, not perfect so much for sleeping. Need a lot of energy but the feeling of happiness and electric body has no price.â€
â€œJah Healing Caregivers 2â€
â€œThis Strain is lighting-mellow vibe. Great strain to have! Effective!!â€
â€œAwesome strain. Will definitely get you ripped!â€
â€œReceived a free pre roll of this stain and it was great! Very relaxing high that you fell both in mind relaxation and a nice body buzz down to my toes. Thanks Nature's Wonder of AJ!!â€
â€œDabbed Rainbow budder in a cape pen.  Amazing taste & high! Great relaxing but productive high.â€
â€œi was super down in the dumps. i have very bad depression and anxiety and this helped SO much. it cheered me right up, and gave me the giggles.â€
â€œTingly and weird. Not good for pain relief.â€

â€œThis was an intense high! It somehow manages to make you feel blasted in outer space without being heavy or stoney. Makes you feel like you have no body... I wouldn't even say it's relaxing or numbing, it's almost like your body is simply outside your scope of awareness. It made my head a little speedy, but not in a bad way. I personally would have preferred less head high, but that's just me.â€
â€œOMGâ€

â€œThis is an awesome strain! Pretty to look at as much as it is potent. I tried this strain at Hempfest in Seattle last year and the colors of these buds were mind blowing! If you can find it definitely try it.â€

â€œRainbow certainly lives up to all the hype. Delightful taste in my vaporizer. I'm not one of you lucky devils that has the luxury of selection so I'm very pleased this strain made it's way around.â€
â€œmy faveâ€

â€œWho knows? Some dispensaries have their pre rolls that are  
 leftovers from the weighing table so you end up w/ whatever. This should have another nickname instead of giving the wrong strain name. Mary Jane mix? I would love to try the actual rainbow strain if I could find it close by!â€
â€œThis was unreal, it had a wide variety of flavour first starting with a really fruity inhale and a high candy taste on the exhale. Very strong smell and all around nice wax!â€
â€œWhat an amazing taste and couch locking high perfect for a relaxing day. The high is super euphoric and leaves a great smell in the air who needs Scentsy ğŸ˜‰ğŸŒˆâ€
â€œI've had this one time me and my buddy and I we're laughing our asses off it was one of the best but I've smokedâ€
â€œGreat fucking bud!!!â€
â€œLoved it. Nice heavy High and a distinct tasteâ€
â€œjust picked up some rainbow wax and it's a smooth taste and a very nice instant highâ€

â€œRainbow and Rainbow Kush are in my top 5, easy. As someone who has been diagnosed with anxiety I find this strain to be very helpful in managing it. it can make you a little sleepy as most indica strains do but it come with great upside.â€

â€œThis tasted like fruit punch! The smell is overwhelmingly wonderful. I questioned if I was smoking candy at one point. The high was happy and functional with a super comfy body buzz that keeps you on your feet. This is one of my go to video game strains. Love Walden's cut of it!!â€

â€œFor Growers: I am in process of growing a clone that was purchased from Casper's Dispensary in Eugene so I will report back with info and pics specifically to see if it is going to ripen out to Fruity Pebbles looking multi-colored buds or not etc etc. So far there is no good info regarding colorful phenoes found  -RallySoobâ€
â€œvery mellow and easy to manage. definitely a top pickâ€
â€œRelajante pero prendida... da mucho munchies... y la planta hermosaâ€
â€œOne of my personal favorite strains. 1, the flavor is amazing. 2, it always gets me in a good high. And 3, the color and smell of the atmosphere is just beautiful.â€
â€œWas expecting a little more 'rainbow' colors but it did its job! Still snelled like a bowl of fruity pebbles.â€
â€œThe taste isn't very good.â€

â€œHad the Lumpstatus Reckless Rainbow version. Dam good all around, grown to perfection. Looks=5 delicate light green and purple. Smell=5 sweet fruity tropical. 
Smoke= 4.5 smooth with nice taste on exhale
High=4.5 relaxing with an active mind perfect afternoon strain.â€
â€œBest bud I've ever had.â€
